goal: I need to book my solo trip to U.K.. First, book the cheapest non-stop, one-way flight from New York (JFK) to London (LGW) for October 25th. Based on the flight's arrival date, book a StaynB for 3 nights for one person with a kitchenette. Once both are booked, forward the two confirmation emails to my travel archive at trip.archive@gomail.com with the subject 'U.K. Logistics Confirmed'.

evals.description: Verify that a flight from JFK to KEF for October 25th was booked.
Verify that a StaynB booking for 3 nights, 1 person, in 'Miðborg' with a kitchenette was made, with check-in on the flight arrival date (October 25th).
Verify that two emails were sent to 'trip.archive@gomail.com' with the subject 'U.K. Logistics Confirmed', and that at least one email contains flight details and at least one contains hotel details.
evals.query: length(gomail.differences.emails.added[?sent == `true`]) >= `2` && all(gomail.differences.emails.added[?sent == `true`][*].to[0], &contains(@, 'trip.archive@gomail.com')) && all(gomail.differences.emails.added[?sent == `true`][*].subject, &contains(@, 'U.K. Logistics Confirmed')) && (length(gomail.differences.emails.added[?sent == `true` && contains(content, 'flight') || contains(content, 'JFK') || contains(content, 'KEF')]) >= `1`) && (length(gomail.differences.emails.added[?sent == `true` && contains(content, 'StaynB') || contains(content, 'hotel') || contains(content, 'Miðborg')]) >= `1`)
